fr.sorbonne_u.components

Class AbstractComponentHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponentHelper

  • public class AbstractComponentHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The class AbstractComponentHelper defines a set of static methods used in the class AbstractComponent but also in some others.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-06-06

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

 post   true                    // no postcondition.

      • getConstructor

        public static java.lang.reflect.Constructor<?> getConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> cl,
                                                              java.lang.Object[] constructorParams)
                                                       throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                              java.lang.SecurityException
        find the constructor in the provided class corresponding to the given constructor parameters.

        Contract

         pre    cl != null and constructorParams != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        cl - class which constructor will be called.
        constructorParams - actual parameters of the constructor.
        Returns:
        constructor corresponding to the parameters modulo the substitution of primitive types for the corresponding wrapper classes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if no such constructor exists.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the reflective access violates the access control status.

      • isAssignable

        private static boolean isAssignable(java.lang.Class<?> fromClass,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> toClass)
        return true if a value of the actual can be assigned to the formal.

        Contract

         pre    fromClass != null and toClass != null
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        fromClass - actual parameter type which values must be assigned to the formal parameter.
        toClass - class typing a formal parameter to be assigned.
        Returns:
        true if a value of the actual can be assigned to the formal.
